articles.description: The Ray is Sonos’ most compact and inexpensive soundbar, which arrives June 7th.
articles.content: Sonos products have never been cheap; in fact, the company raised prices on most of them last year. But Sonos has also recently released some products that push things into more affordable territory.… [+4476 chars]
